amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the aggregate contribution limit for individuals from $30,000 to $75,000.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 2 printed in H.Rept. 106-311 to increase the aggregate contribution limit from $30,000 to $75,000.

action.text: Doolittle amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent. The amendment is inserted after line 17 instead of line 8 on page 12 of the bill.
On agreeing to the Doolittle amendment (A002) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 302 (Roll no. 412).
